channel.title: THE funniest shit in the world
channel.description:
So, some kid i've known for about a year was sellign a 137 rs account for 100$. I bought it off him and he sends me wrong pass and loggs off after i send money. So i make a dispute on paypal and he puts in all this false information. So i got pissed and facebooked this person and got his parents email. So i emailed his parents telling them how he is scamming me 100$ and that im going to press charges etc etc. I left them my phone number and email and what do ya know a few hours later i get a phone call from his parents saying sorry and they've cancled the claim.. only it gets better then i heard some yelling and crying and the kid goes on the phone and his parents make him personally apologise to me for attempting to scam while hes crying.
Best day of my life.
